mapper.select: SELECT num, name,p.writer, content, ref_group, comment_group, regdate FROM tp_priboard_comment p JOIN tp_account a ON( a.user_id = p.writer) WHERE ref_group=#{num} ORDER BY comment_group ASC, num ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tp_priboard_comment (num, writer, content, ref_group, comment_group, regdate) VALUES(#{num}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{ref_group}, #{comment_group}, SYSDATE)
